questions: Is there an image of a character whose aura is being graded? Answer with yes or no.
Is the image cropped to the size of a real card? Answer with yes or no.
Does the label at the top have the title 'GNRLYXYZ'? Answer with yes or no.
Is '1/1' displayed directly below 'GNRLYXYZ' on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a barcode placed beneath the '1/1'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the grade label displayed on the right side of the label at the top? Answer with yes or no.
Is the numeric grade from the scale displayed below the grade label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the certification number displayed below the numeric grade? Answer with yes or no.
Is all text on the label uniform in size? Answer with yes or no.
Is there balanced padding from the border for all text on the label? Answer with yes or no.
Is the display placed on a white background? Answer with yes or no.
Is the full display shown without any text or labels on the card? Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
no The image features a character but does not show any aura grading.

no The image appears to depict a collectible card-sized image rather than being precisely cropped like a real-world physical card.

no The label at the top includes 'GLD NRLYXYZ', not 'GNRLYXYZ'.

no Since 'GNRLYXYZ' is not present, '1/1' cannot be directly below it.

no There is no barcode beneath '1/1', and '1/1' isn't present as described.

no There is no grade label visible at the top right side of the label.

no There is no numeric grade displayed below a grade label due to the absence of such a label.

no There is no certification number displayed since the grading elements mentioned are not present.

no The text on various parts of the label (title, descriptions) varies in size indicating non-uniformity.

no The spacing (padding) between different text and the borders varies, showing unbalanced padding.

yes The image displays a card against a plain white background.

no The card has text and labels; it is not devoid of text or labels.
